items.headline: Stock futures rise over optimism for U.S.-China trade deal ahead of Trump-Xi meeting
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures gained Sunday after top negotiators for the U.S. and China expressed optimism that a new trade deal is in reach, ahead of a key meeting later this week between President Donald Trump and China’s President Xi Jinping.
